mapper.insert: insert into linket.Event(event_company_id, event_name, event_type, start_date, end_date, place, event_inq, event_image, event_desc, reg_date, link) values (#{companyId}, #{eventName}, #{eventType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{place}, #{eventInq}, #{eventImage}, #{eventDesc}, DEFAULT, #{link})
mapper.update:
update event set event_name = #{eventName}, event_type = #{eventType}, place = #{place}, event_image = #{eventImage}, event_inq = #{eventInq}, event_desc = #{eventDesc}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, last_updated_date = DEFAULT, link = #{link}
where event_id = #{eventId} and event_status = 'Y'

update event set event_status = 'N', last_updated_date = DEFAULT, deleted_date = DEFAULT
where event_id = #{eventId} and event_status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select event_id, event_company_id, event_name, event_type, place, event_image, event_inq, event_desc, event_status, start_date, end_date, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS last_updated_date, DATE_FORMAT(deleted_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS deleted_date, link from event where event_company_id = #{eventCompanyId} order by reg_date desc

select event_id, event_company_id, event_name, event_type, place, event_image, event_inq, event_desc, event_status, start_date, end_date, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS last_updated_date, DATE_FORMAT(deleted_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS deleted_date, link from event where event_id = #{eventId} and event_status = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into Linket.hire(hire_event_id, hire_company_id, work_name, work_hour, work_start_day, work_end_day, pay, edu, reg_date) values (#{eventId}, #{companyId}, #{workName}, #{workHour}, #{workStartDay}, #{workEndDay}, #{pay}, #{edu}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: select hire_id, hire_event_id, hire_company_id, work_name, work_hour, DATE_FORMAT(work_start_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS work_start_day, DATE_FORMAT(work_end_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS work_end_day, pay, edu, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS reg_date from hire where hire_event_id = #{VALUES} order by reg_date desc

select d.hire_id, d.hire_event_id, d.hire_company_id, d.work_name, d.work_hour, DATE_FORMAT(d.work_start_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS work_start_day, DATE_FORMAT(d.work_end_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS work_end_day, d.pay, d.edu, DATE_FORMAT(d.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS reg_date, e.event_id, e.event_company_id, e.event_name, e.event_type, e.place, e.event_image, e.event_inq, e.event_desc, e.event_status, e.start_date, e.end_date, DATE_FORMAT(e.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(e.last_updated_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS last_updated_date, DATE_FORMAT(e.deleted_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') AS deleted_date, e.link
from hire d Right Outer Join event e on d.hire_event_id = e.event_id where hire_id = #{hire_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user LEFT JOIN event ON user.user_company_id = event.event_company_id WHERE event_id = #{VALUES}

SELECT event_id, event_company_id, event_name, event_type, place, event_image, event_inq, event_desc, event_status, start_date, end_date, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i'), DATE_FORMAT(last_updated_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i'), DATE_FORMAT(deleted_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i'), link FROM event WHERE event_id = #{VALUES}

SELECT hire_id, hire_event_id, hire_company_id, work_name, work_hour, DATE_FORMAT(work_start_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i'), DATE_FORMAT(work_end_day, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i'), pay, edu, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d-%H-%i') FROM hire WHERE hire_event_id = #{VALUES}
